text: Bob and Mike Bryan were the defending champions, but lost in the quarterfinals to Florin Mergea and Horia Tecău. Ivan Dodig and Marcelo Melo won the title, defeating Jamie Murray and Bruno Soares in the final, 6–4, 6–4. ==Seeds== All seeds received a bye into the second round. ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ===Bottom half=== ==References== *Main Draw Rogers Cup - Men's Doubles Men's Doubles
title: 2016 Rogers Cup – Men's Doubles
